title: Learn Bangla Language
des: Bangla is the most widely spoken language of Bangladesh With 228 million native speakers.

title: Learn English Language
des: Modern English has been spreading around the world since the 17th century by the worldwide.

title: Learn Spanish Language
des: Spanish is a Romance language that originated in the Iberian Peninsula of Europe. it is a global language with nearly 500 million native speakers,

title: Learn Chinese Language
des: Chinese is a group of languages that form the Sinitic branch of the Sino-Tibetan languages, About 1.3 billion people speak a variety of Chinese as their first language.

title: Learn French Language
des: French is a Romance language of the Indo-European family. It descended from the Vulgar Latin of the Roman Empire, as did all Romance languages.

title: Learn Russian Language
des: Russian is an East Slavic language native to the Russians in Eastern Europe. It is a part of the Indo-European language family, and is one of four living East Slavic languages, and also part of the larger Balto-Slavic branch.

title: Learn Portuguese Language
des: Portuguese is a Romance language originating in the Iberian Peninsula of Europe. With approximately 215 to 220 million native speakers and 50 million L2 speakers, Portuguese has approximately 270 million total speakers

title: Learn Indonesian Language
des: Indonesian is the official language of Indonesia. It is a standardized variety of Malay, Indonesia is the fourth most populous nation in the worldâ€”of which the majority speak Indonesian, which makes it one of the more widely spoken languages in the world.

title: Learn Hindi Language
des: As a linguistic variety, Hindi is the fourth most-spoken first language in the world, after Mandarin, Spanish and English. Hindi alongside Urdu as Hindustani is the third most-spoken language in the world, after Mandarin and English.
